rules.name: Parties Identification
rules.description: Contract must clearly identify all parties involved in the agreement

rules.name: Agreement Date
rules.description: Contract must specify the date when the agreement was signed

rules.name: Effective Date
rules.description: Contract must define when the agreement becomes effective

rules.name: Expiration Date
rules.description: Contract must specify when the agreement will expire or if it is perpetual

rules.name: Renewal Terms
rules.description: Contract must clearly define renewal terms if applicable

rules.name: Termination Notice
rules.description: Contract must specify notice period required to terminate renewal

rules.name: Governing Law
rules.description: Contract must specify which law governs the agreement

rules.name: Jurisdiction
rules.description: Contract must define jurisdiction for dispute resolution

rules.name: Payment Terms
rules.description: Contract must specify payment terms and conditions

rules.name: Confidentiality
rules.description: Contract should include confidentiality and non-disclosure clauses

rules.name: Liability Limitation
rules.description: Contract should define limitations on liability and damages

rules.name: Intellectual Property
rules.description: Contract must address intellectual property rights and ownership

rules.name: Indemnification
rules.description: Contract should include indemnification clauses to protect parties

rules.name: Entire Agreement
rules.description: Contract should contain an entire agreement clause

rules.name: Amendment Procedures
rules.description: Contract should specify how amendments can be made

rules.name: Dispute Resolution
rules.description: Contract should define dispute resolution mechanisms
